import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Scanner;
class acm14kp5 {

	/**
	 * @param args
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		short n,i,t=sc.nextShort();
		int sum;
		for(short j=1;j<=t;j++)
		{
			sum=0;
			n=sc.nextShort();
			int arr[]=new int[n];
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
				arr[i]=sc.nextInt();
			Arrays.sort(arr);
			sum=arr[n-1]+arr[n-2]+arr[n-3];
			System.out.println("Case "+j+": "+sum);
		}
		
		sc.close();
	}

}
